Minutes - September 29, 1954
Pag© 2
The meeting convened at 9:30 AM. Th© Chairman recommended
adjournment at 2:30 PM to accommodate several members who had other
commitments.
The minutes of the previous meeting were approved, and the following
agenda agreed upon:
X Approval of Minutes of Last Meeting
XI Agenda for the Day
III ■ Financial Report
XV Recommendations of the Director
1. That JCRT file comments supporting
educationally owned intercity relays
2. That JCST encourage the development by
the electronics industry and acceptance
by the FCC of low-power, low-cost
television stations
V Activities 3ince bast Meeting
A. Concerning the FCC
1. Grant to Andalusia, Alabama
2. Developments in Miami
3. Channel threat in Tampa - St. Petersburg
4. Change in FCC Chairmanship
5. Tri-State Developments, Hew England
B. Staff
1. Legislative Work Conference, Houston - Hew Orleans
2. NAEB Conference
3. Land-Grant Meeting
4. Status Report — Educational TV
5. Washington State Report
VI Reports
NCCET - Robert Mullen
ACE - Eunice Parker
VII 11:30 AM - Executive Session
VIII New Business
IX General Discussion
X Adjournment
